title: Roadside Bomb Kills 8 in Borno State
description: A roadside bomb suspected to have been planted by Islamic extremists exploded under a passenger bus along the Damboa-Maiduguri highway in Borno State, northeastern Nigeria, killing eight individuals and injuring over a dozen others.

sources.title: A roadside bomb kills 8 bus passengers in northeast Nigeria

title: Fulani Herdsmen Attack in Plateau State
description: At least 40 people were killed in a deadly attack by suspected Fulani Muslim herders on the predominantly Christian farming community of Zike in north-central Nigeria's Plateau State.

sources.title: Attack by gunmen leaves at least 40 people dead in Nigeria

title: IPOB Militants Kill Five in Anambra State
description: Gunmen suspected to be members of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) and its armed wing, the Eastern Security Network (ESN), attacked a restaurant near the Odumegwu Ojukwu University gate in Uli, Anambra State, killing five people.

sources.title: Communities Reel from Deadly Attacks by Bandits in Zamfara, IPOB
